title: Bayou Whispers
description: Once they have you, you never leaveA vacation to the city of New Orleans will prove to become Violetâ€™s worst nightmare. After meeting a handsome stranger at a bar, her life takes a turn...a very dark turn.Violet is tested, not knowing who to trust or who she can turn to. Is she really held against her will by spirits, or has she become victim of a vicious cult?**Bonus: The prequel of Exordium is included with the purchase of Bayou Whispers.
author: Lily Wallis
